MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH21 and EH33 postcode areas of Musselburgh and Tranent, affecting properties in Myles Farm and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.05pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repairs required to a grounded overhead cable and awaiting more engineers to attend site. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:04PM on Wednesday 11 November 2020.
